title: This RTX 4090 GPU has a huge problem. It caught fire
description: There might be a problem with the Nvidia GeForce RTX 4090, and it's bad enough that the power connector actually burned up.

title: Nvidia may already be moving on from the RTX 4090, and that’s bad news for gamers
description: Nvidia may be changing lanes and switching its focus away from the RTX 4090 and onto a different kind of graphics solution.

title: This gorgeous triple-monitor stand can hold three 22-pound displays
description: Racing game fanatics and flight sim aficionados can finally get that immersed experience thanks to the Monoprice Dark Matter triple-monitor stand.
